content.question: The shifting of a countryâ€™s production possibilities curve to the right will most likely cause

choices.label: the aggregate demand curve to shift to the left
the long-run aggregate supply curve to shift to the left
the long-run aggregate supply curve to shift to the right

content.answer: the long-run aggregate supply curve to shift to the right

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
